name: Front Lawns
longDes: You are on the front lawns of the mansion. There is a large expanse of greenery before you. There is a flower ^garden# near the front of the house, full of vibrant purple flowers. The borders of the flower garden is of curious-looking stone. There are two rows of tall trees here. To the $North# is the front porch of the house.
shortDes: You are standing on the front lawns. There is a ^garden# of purple flowers here adjacent to the front of the house. Trees line the drive and you see locked gates beyond. To the $North# is the front porch leading to the house entry.

startingItems.name: stone
startingItems.description: A stone with the image of a rose on it.

features.name: garden
features.preActionDes: You look at the purple flower garden. There is a @stone# that seems to be out of place on it.
features.inActionDes: You take the stone. Upon closer inspection, it's got a carved image of a rose on it.
features.postActionDes: This is where you took the stone with the rose on it.

features.name: tree
features.preActionDes: An apparition of a young girl hovers near one of the largest trees. The girl points to a pair of @shears# leaned up against the base of the tree
features.inActionDes: You see the pair of shears leaned up against the base of the tree.
features.postActionDes: This is where you found the set of shears.

features.name: grave
features.preActionDes: There is a spot at the base of a tree, below where the apparition was, that looks special. Perhaps it could be used for a makeshift grave?
features.inActionDes:
You dig a hole at the bottom of the tree, making a makeshift grave.

The locket you took from the Solarium glows in your hand now. Should you place it in the grave?
features.postActionDes: This is where you dug the grave. Maybe you should place the locket there?

features.name: girl
features.preActionDes: The girl is crying, hovering near a tree. At the base of the tree you see a pair of @shears#.
features.inActionDes: The girl is crying. The vision is hazy, she begins to fade.
features.postActionDes: The girl was hear a moment ago...
